show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
My guest Thomas Fewer is a New Orleans counselor who has spoken out against the diagnosing and drugging of children. … We talk about offering meaningful therapy for adults from an existential, spiritual, and depth perspective.
   May other therapists be inspired to speak out and to practice according to what they know is right.
